title: Google pixel e-mail support
content:
I need google customer service email to deal with my battery issue on my pixel 3 phone.
Unfortunately my Pixel 3 purchased on December 2018 can't remain on for more than 5 minutes which makes it impossible to get support by google assistant. 
After doing all troubleshooting and factory reset, it did not improve at all. I need to figure out next steps and discuss my warranty status.
It is really frustrating to have a very expense brick at my house at this moment and see that customer support does not acknowledge the fact that are lots of users experiencing the same problem.
